ValidationRule.description: If the provider is a trainee, the trainee type (pcptraintype__c) must be specified. This validation fires only if the current time is greater than or equal to Bypass_Validations_Timeout__c.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( Bypass_Validations_Timeout__c <= NOW(), ISPICKVAL( The_provider_is_a_Trainee__c , 'Yes'), ISPICKVAL( Trainee_Type__c , '') )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Please specify the Trainee Type if the provider is marked as a Trainee.
